		Question: what art did wassily kandinsky do

Sure, here is the answer of the question.

Wassily Kandinsky was a Russian artist known for his abstract paintings and expressive colors. He was one of the leading artists of the early 20th century and is considered one of the pioneers of abstraction. Kandinsky's art explored themes of color, form, and rhythm and was influential in the development of modern art. His paintings were exhibited throughout Europe and the United States and are in major museums and private collections.
